name: Rootfather: Revenge of the Potat
description:
The Gnocchi familia murdered the Potat family in cold blood. But during mash-acre, they left behind Mikel Potat, their youngest son. Now, armed with a potato peeler, Mikel rises to get his revenge - he's ready to french fry anyone that stands between him and the head of the Gnocchi familia - the Rootfather. Help Mikel defeat the Gnocchi familia minions and teach the Rootfather a lesson - rotten potatoes don’t belong in this city.

https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/rootfather-revenge-potat-5
